title: Cars collide in Fochville, two killed
text:
One of the vehicles involved in a deadly crash in Fochville, (Photo supplied by ER24)

Pretoria - Two people were killed on the N12 near Fochville when two cars collided head on, paramedics said on Saturday.

ER24 spokesperson Chitra Bodasing said paramedics and Fochville Fire and Rescue found the badly damaged vehicles on the side of the road in the veld.

“Two people were found trapped in one of the vehicles. Fire and Rescue as well as paramedics worked together to extricate the men. Upon assessment it was found that the passenger was in a serious condition.

“He was treated for his injuries and transported to hospital. The driver died despite efforts by paramedics to save him,” said Bodasing.

The driver of the second vehicle also died on the scene.

Three other men who were passengers of the second vehicle sustained minor injuries and they were treated and transported to hospital.
description: Two people have been killed on the N12 near Fochville after two cars collided head on.
